title: Chang’an Intoxicated, A Chaos-Bringing Concubine - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Historical   Romance   Shounen Ai   Tragedy
tags: Ancient China   Aristocracy   Army   Brotherhood   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Incest   Modern Day   Modern Knowledge   Politics   Royalty   R*pe   Strategic Battles   Transmigration   Wars
author: Li Fu   离弗
description:
He said, “I’ll wait for you.”

“I’ll always wait for you.”

As the dusky evening sky rained over him, he stood tall over the remnants of the fallen city. “I told you, I will wait at the banks of the Fei River for your return.”

A thousand years he stood waiting, watching the water ebb and flow.>
